```
apiVersion: v1
kind: Service
metadata:
  name: api-service
spec:
  selector:
    app: api-app
  ports:
    - protocol: TCP
      port: 80
      targetPort: 8080
```

```
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
  name: ingress-example
  annotations:
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/rewrite-target: /
spec:
  ingressClassName: nginx-example
  rules:
  - http:
      paths:
      - path: /api
        pathType: Prefix
        backend:
          service:
            name: api-service
            port:
              number: 80
```

```
apiVersion: v1
kind: Service
metadata:
  name: api-service
spec:
  selector:
    app: api-app
  ports:
    - protocol: TCP
      port: 80
      targetPort: 8080
  type: LoadBalancer
```
